Posts.Content: Aug 29, 2016 10:15PM IHGJAnn49 wrote: Hi Michelle.. I'm going in for surgery Sept. 2. they told me it would be in day surgery, go in at 6am and home about 1pm. and about a week for recovery.. other then that this is all new to me too.. i wanted to go back to July, skip Aug. altogether and go right to September... Right now, I'm believing the Lord has already taken care of it and when they go in they will find NO Lump!
Posts.Title: Heading in for surgery on 8/30 Michelle_in_cornland Michelle_in_cornland
